name: RowRow
description:
Description“RowRow” is a unique sliding puzzle game.
With more than 100 level of hand crafted stages and diverse puzzle logics.
It is as simple as matching shapes. Align rows of shapes, sum them up
and match the border-lined shapes to clear a stage.Key Features
  • - Completely New Puzzle Logic
  • - Minimalistic Design
  • - One Hundred+ Handcrafted Levels
  • - Challenging Brain Teaser
  • - Simple Intuitive Recognition
ChallengeWe challenge you to get ALL achievements,
It may be impossible to clear all stage from 90 to 100.
Good Luck!
